main event: On 8 October 1954, multiple officers and civilians observed an unidentified aerial object in the sky over Enid, Oklahoma.
interesting points: The object was described as round, white in color, and appeared to be glowing., It made no sound and was observed for approximately 2-3 minutes before disappearing., A civilian report mentioned a disc-shaped object hovering at an estimated altitude of 2,000 feet., Witnesses included military personnel and civilians, although no detailed accounts from civilians were provided., The object was observed to maneuver rapidly and change direction several times.
witness description: two officers from the command and several civilian witnesses
